title: Regal Rose Gold Diamond Cascade Necklace Set - A Timeless Statement
materials: Crafted in 18K Rose Gold. Features meticulously hand-set
near colorless diamonds (VS clarity) with brilliant cuts. Hyderabadi polish imparts a lasting sheen and enhances the rose gold's warmth.
features: This striking set features a cascade necklace design reminiscent of a classic Haaram, updated with a contemporary flair. The necklace showcases three oval-shaped focal points, each intricately embellished with filigree work. Matching Jhumka-inspired earrings echo the necklace's design, creating a cohesive and glamorous look. The use of circular patterns throughout lends the piece a modern geometric aesthetic.
colors: Primarily Rose Gold with the sparkling white brilliance of diamonds. The rose gold adds warmth and sophistication
occasions: and high-end parties. Also suitable for milestone celebrations like anniversaries or birthdays
adding a touch of regal elegance.
description: This exquisitely crafted set is a unique blend of traditional design principles and contemporary aesthetics. Its rose gold and diamond combination provides a luxurious and timeless appeal. The intricate filigree work showcases exceptional craftsmanship, making this a truly special heirloom piece. The necklace's unique cascade design ensures it stands out in any crowd.
